sqlMap.sql: insert into LNSRECEIPT (ACCTNO, MID, CUSTOMID, CUSTTYPE, SUBSYS, OPENDATE, CLOSEDATE, STATUS, SUMDEINT, SUMDEFINT, SUMFEE, SUMGRMNT, REMNT1, REMNT2, REVERSE1, REVERSE2, BRC, SUMRINT, SUMRFINT, SUMDELINT, SUMDELFINT) values (:acctno, :mid, :customid, :custtype, :subsys, :opendate, :closedate, :status, :sumdeint, :sumdefint, :sumfee, :sumgrmnt, :remnt1, :remnt2, :reverse1, :reverse2, :brc, :sumrint, :sumrfint, :sumdelint, :sumdelfint)

update LNSRECEIPT set MID = :mid, CUSTOMID = :customid, CUSTTYPE = :custtype, SUBSYS = :subsys, OPENDATE = :opendate, CLOSEDATE = :closedate, STATUS = :status, SUMDEINT = :sumdeint, SUMDEFINT = :sumdefint, SUMFEE = :sumfee, SUMGRMNT = :sumgrmnt, REMNT1 = :remnt1, REMNT2 = :remnt2, REVERSE1 = :reverse1, REVERSE2 = :reverse2, BRC = :brc, SUMRINT = :sumrint, SUMRFINT = :sumrfint, SUMDELINT = :sumdelint, SUMDELFINT = :sumdelfint where ACCTNO = :acctno

select ACCTNO, MID, CUSTOMID, CUSTTYPE, SUBSYS, OPENDATE, CLOSEDATE, STATUS, SUMDEINT, SUMDEFINT, SUMFEE, SUMGRMNT, REMNT1, REMNT2, REVERSE1, REVERSE2, BRC, SUMRINT, SUMRFINT, SUMDELINT, SUMDELFINT from LNSRECEIPT where ACCTNO = :acctno
